attributes.action: Volunteer this Labour Government's immediate resignation from office after child benefit data breach endangering the nation's children etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Labour Government no longer carries the respect or trust of the nation, having presided over the most abominable breach of data security putting in jeopardy the financial, moral, personal integrity of almost half the nation (25 million individuals) incurring massive risk to the safety of children, personal financial security, and the integrity of personal identification data. This petition calls for the immediate resignation of the Labour Government and an election at the earliest opportunity

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
